location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Account of Broad Cloth and Perpets delivered to Coja Evra Ben Ibrahim to complement the sum of 32,000 rupees as before requested by the Bussora (Basra) Council from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has two holes in its text.

mods.abstract: A list of the amounts and prices of cloths delivered to Coja Evra Ben Ibrahim.
